All functions

  • bind_tables

GET a document from ECOS.

  • download_document

Download an image file

  • download_pic

ecosscraper: Get data and documents from ECOS

  • ecosscraper

Filter TECP_table to return only domestic ESA-listed species

  • filter_domestic

Filter TECP_table to return only threatened and endangered species

  • filter_listed

  • filter_taxa

Find the phantomjs binary

  • find_phantom

  • get_5yrev_links

Get a listing of link suffixes for HCPs, SHA, and CCA/As

  • get_agmt_type_links

  • get_cons_plan_links

  • get_conservation_plan_data

Get the table of counties of occurrence from ECOS

  • get_counties

Use phantomjs to get a page from ECOS

  • get_ECOS_page

Get the links for Federal Register documents on ECOS species' pages

  • get_fedreg_links

Get a data.frame of links and their titles from a web page

  • get_link_df

  • get_petitions_table

Get the links for recovery plans on ECOS species' pages

  • get_recovery_links

Get the table at https://ecos.fws.gov/ecp0/pub/speciesRecovery.jsp

  • get_recovery_table

Return all links on a species' ECOS page

  • get_species_links

  • get_species_page_summary

  • get_species_page

Get all tables from a species' ECOS page

  • get_species_tables

  • get_species_tsn

  • get_species_url

  • get_TECP_table

  • install_phantom

  • remove_silly_links
